name: invidious
description: Invidious is a privacy focused alternative front end for YouTube. It proxies video, search and subscriptions without ads or tracking, supports RSS feeds and multiple clients, and can be self hosted as a lightweight video portal.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Watch YouTube without Google tracking your viewing habits

features.title: Ad
features.description: No advertisements or sponsored content interrupting videos

features.title: Subscription Management
features.description: Subscribe to channels without a Google account

features.title: Rss Feeds
features.description: Generate RSS feeds for channels to follow in your feed reader

features.title: Proxy Streaming
features.description: Stream videos through your server to hide your IP from YouTube

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Fast, minimal UI focused on content over distractions

features.title: Audio
features.description: Listen to videos without loading video streams to save bandwidth

features.title: Multiple Instances
features.description: Connect to public instances or self-host your own
